text: Jara tvarita prapta honari dhana-sampada asati, ani halakasa pravasa asata tara he avasya tumacya mage nighale asate, parantu tyanna tara lamba antaraca pravasa motha kathina vatala ani ata tara he allahaci sapatha ghe'una sangatila ki amacya angi jara sakti-samarthya rahile asate tara amhi avasya tumacyasobata nighalo asato. Te apalya prananna svatahca vinasakade neta aheta. Tyancya khotepanace khare jnana allahala ahe
